location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 13: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche asks for Edward Galley's assistance in the recovery of items that were sent by Latouche on board a boat that was plundered at Carrack [Bandar-e ChƒÅrak], en route to Muscat. Latouche informs Galley that he has dispatched a boat to Muscat. He states that the boat will call at Bushire so that Galley can add any comments to a letter addressed to the Governor and Council at Bombay.
